import sys

for __ in range(input()) :
    s = map(ord,raw_input())
    mark = [0]*150
    for i in s :
        mark[i] += 1
    frnt , bck = 0 , 0
    for i in s :
        if mark[i] == 1 :
            frnt = i
            break
    for i in reversed(s) :
        if mark[i] == 1 :
            bck = i
            break
    if frnt == 0 or bck == 0 :
        print "PANDEY"
    else :
        if frnt > bck :
            print "SHANKY"
        else :
            if frnt==bck :
                print "PANDEY"
            else :
                print "ANKU"
